title: Panel on The Next Generation of Transportation Systems,Greenhouse Emissions, and Data Mining
segmentation: Alright, good afternoon everyone.
Before I start I want to mention you know like early morning talk on.
Social science, computational social science.

So what are you going to do?

So first of all, it reduces the idle time on the vehicles waiting to turn left.
And concerns fuel.

And it continues.
It happened and Furthermore you know to do this.

Then you need to figure out you know bin packing problem here.
How to load the packages in the truck and how do you do dynamic routing, real time monitoring.
So all the mathematician got excited in UPS and worked on these problems and very good results.
And that same year the UPS had three point 1,000,000 tons.

And the idea is that sometimes people that Discovery Idea but they just don't exploit them.
